message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value, I'm initially offering it at $22,000.
Alice, $22,000 is way too high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go above $10,000.  Let me know if you're willing to work with me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $18,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm prepared to pay $12,000, which is a fair price considering my maximum limit.  Let's see if we can make this deal work.
